00044 DECLARE_CLASS(DownSampler)
00045 {
00046 public:
00048     DownSampler(const DownSampler & x)
00049     {
00050         setNative(x.getNative());
00051     }
00052 
00054     DownSampler & operator=(const DownSampler & x)
00055     {
00056         if (&x != this)
00057             setNative(x.getNative());
00058         return *this;
00059     }
00060 
00062     DownSampler(nitf_DownSampler * x)
00063     {
00064         setNative(x);
00065         getNativeOrThrow();
00066     }
00067 
00068     virtual ~DownSampler(){}
00069 
00098     virtual void apply(NITF_DATA ** inputWindow,
00099                        NITF_DATA ** outputWindow,
00100                        nitf::Uint32 numBands,
00101                        nitf::Uint32 numWindowRows,
00102                        nitf::Uint32 numWindowCols,
00103                        nitf::Uint32 numInputCols,
00104                        nitf::Uint32 numSubWindowCols,
00105                        nitf::Uint32 pixelType,
00106                        nitf::Uint32 pixelSize,
00107                        nitf::Uint32 rowsInLastWindow,
00108                        nitf::Uint32 colsInLastWindow) throw (nitf::NITFException)
00109     {}

00119                                        NITF_DATA** inputWindow,
00120                                        NITF_DATA** outputWindow,

00132     static void DownSampler_destruct(NITF_DATA* data);
00133 
00134 protected:
00135     void setMembers(){}
00136 
00138     nitf_IDownSampler getIDownSampler()
00139     {
00140         // Create a band source interface that
00141         // the native layer can use
00142         nitf_IDownSampler downSampler =
00143             {
00144                 &DownSampler_apply,
00145                 &DownSampler_destruct
00146             };
00147         return downSampler;
00148     }
